name: Tactor The Tiger
description:
Welcome to Tactor The Tiger, The 2D platformer game. 

To play the early prototype version of this game please down the zip file.

Unzip The file, game is only available currently for windows soon to be for MacOS as well.

How to play: WSAD to move. Space to Jump.

Game Intent: Survive! Player has a timer, survive till the timer runs out. Pretty straight forward right? Good luck!

Image Credits:  Images borrowed from The LionKing Video Game by Super Nintendo Entertainment System and Sega Genesis.
